default_microphone_is_mute_now: The default microphone is mute now.
issue_with_the_microphone: There is an issue with the microphone.
libcommbase_introduction: Hi, I am libcommbase. I am a collection of libraries to centralize common functions that can be shared across multiple conversational Artificial Intelligence powered assistant projects. I can be implemented with A I ( M L / D S ) and programming languages. Likewise, I am usually distributed with Commbase, an extensible and flexible development framework, and a module and library bundler.
